name: MyExtraBrain
0:
”Alexa, ask My Extra Brain to Remind Me to wash the car on Saturday.”
”Remind me to feed the dog in 10 minutes.”
”Remind me to leave for work at 7am tomorrow.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my extra brain
Developer Terms of Use
des: Just ask for a quick reminder, and we'll send you a text at the time. This isn't a fancy reminder service with snoozing, repeating reminders, or any of that jazz. Just ask us, and we'll remind you. The skill works by securely storing your phone number and reminders associated with your unique Alexa userId. Then, when it's time for your reminder, we send your reminder to you via SMS. Standard text messaging rates from your carrier apply. Reminders will be sent from the number 37083.
